report.title: Potential
report.author: CrakkBakk
report.bodytext: 50mg experience report of 4FlouroAmphetamine (4FMP/4FMA/4flo etc) /n /n Me: male, 160lb, extensive drug history regarding meth, MDMA and ecstasy pills. Prescribed Lamictol for Bipolar Disorder. /n Girlfriend: female, 100lbs, moderate drug history regarding meth, MDMA and ecstasy pills. No prescriptions /n /n My mindset: relaxed yet excited to try a new drug /n Inentions: Have a good time w/ gf via empathetic effects/euphoria /n Stomache: empty /n /n GF appeared happy yet a bit worried about trying a new drug and ate about 1 hour before hand. /n /n T0:00: GF and I take 50mg of 4FlouroAmpehtamine orally. /n /n T0:40: I'm feeling something for sure but it could be placebo at this point. It feels like a slight come up on MDMA but no stimulation at all. GF is feeling stimulation. I'm feely happy, not euphoric. /n /n T1:10: I'm feeling stimulated, but not in a twacked sort of way. Hard to explain the feeling, best left as 'passive energy.' GF feels twacked out to a degree. I feel very, very euphoric, in a MDMA like way. I feel MDMA like effects more then amphetamine effects, which I sort of feel at this point. I'm perspiring a little bit and the window is open. Studying seems plausible, but I would much rather flirt w/ my girl. GF says this would help her study. /n /n T1:30 I feel like any of the stimulation I had is aleviating, not sure exactly. I know that when I am rolling and I think I'm going to drop off soon I will, so I'm trying not to think about it and just record effects. I still feel really good, not as much MDMA-like as before but still significant. When I concentrate, I can actually make waves of MDMA-like euphoria come back. /n /n T2:00: I'm definitley not feeling as good as before but I'm not crashing. I still feel good. I feel like at the end of an MDMA roll. /n /n 2:40 I'm still feeling the same, not crashed at all. I decide to vaporize ~50mg between my girl and I. I feel very high again, not as much as the 1:10 point. Good booster dose. /n /n How I felt at peak: Very MDMA-like except not as strong empathy wise. Stimulation was great, it was like taking a ecstasy pill w/ an amphetamine in it as that you can dance and do stuff easily (Pure MDMA relaxes me) but it had no come down, as well as not any kick to it. /n /n I vaporized it two more times later that night, w/ effects lowering each time. The last time I smoked I did not get high at all. /n /n I could sleep great on this, even after vaporizing it. /n /n I think the magic dose is going to be around 80-120mg. /n /n Problems: none, literally. /n After effects: sleep was fine, didn't feel crashed at all the next morning, neither did I feel 'e tarded.'
